Uses of Class
org.gsma.joyn.JoynContactFormatException

  • Packages that use JoynContactFormatException 
    Package Description
    org.gsma.joyn.capability
    This API permits to discover capabilities supported by remote contacts.
    org.gsma.joyn.chat
    This API exposes all functionality for single chat and group chat services.
    org.gsma.joyn.ft
    This API exposes all functionality to transfer files in real time.
    org.gsma.joyn.ish
    This API exposes exposes all functionality related to transferring images during a CS call via the Image Share service.
    org.gsma.joyn.session
    This API exposes all functionality to initiate multimedia sessions between two end points based on a dedicated service ID (or feature tag).
    org.gsma.joyn.vsh
    This API exposes all functionality related to sharing live video stream during a CS call via the Video Share service.

      Registers a capabilities listener on a list of contacts
      Capabilities CapabilityService.getContactCapabilities(java.lang.String contact)
      Returns the capabilities of a given contact from the local database.
      void CapabilityService.removeCapabilitiesListener(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contacts, CapabilitiesListener listener)
      Unregisters a capabilities listener on a list of contacts
      void CapabilityService.requestContactCapabilities(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> contacts)
      Requests capabilities for a group of remote contacts.
      void CapabilityService.requestContactCapabilities(java.lang.String contact)
      Requests capabilities to a remote contact.
